sub_title: Founder RAU, Turntoo, Madaster | Architect | Speaker
summary:
Thomas Rau is an architect, entrepreneur, innovator and in sustainability and circular economy. His office RAU has been recognized for being at the forefront of producing innovative, energy positive and circular buildings as a norm. Thomas is guided in his actions by what is necessary in the future rather than by what is feasible today.

Rau is an acclaimed international speaker. He takes part in current international discussions on circularity, sustainability, development of energy-saving technologies, energy positive buildings and new business models. In 2021, he received the Circular Hero Award for his vigorous and groundbreaking work to establish a circular economy.

Together with his partner Sabine Oberhuber, he is the author of Material Matters, a bestseller that outlines the fundamentals of a circular economy. A bestseller in the Netherlands and Germany, the book will see a much anticipated English version in 2022.
